components.value:
In this form, the behaviour of the group component is demonstrated.
There are three groups (left to right):

1. A group with "Initially hidden" check box disabled
2. A group with "Removable" check box enabled
3. A group with "Initially hidden" check box enabled

As you can see 1, 2 groups have 1 row each and 3 group doesn't have any row.
Type any text in the "Group Row Content" input and press "Add Row" button to see the experience.
Press the "Edit your form" button on the top left and get familiar with UI editor, then press "Next" button to see the code in the integrate Python IDE.

code:
from typing import List, Union
from accessor import (
    getValue,
    repeatRow,
    setValue
)

input_text = ['text']
paragraph_par_1 = ['par_1']
paragraph_par_3 = ['par_3']
paragraph_par_2 = ['par_2']

input_content_1 = ['visible', 0, 'content_1']
input_content_2 = ['removable', 0, 'content_2']
input_content_3 = ['hidden', 0, 'content_3']

paragraph_description = ['description']

def on_add_group_click(path: List[Union[str, int]]):
    ### Get the value of the text field
    new_content = getValue(['text'])

    ### Set text fields values of the initially visible group rows
    setValue(['visible', -1, 'content_1'], new_content)
    setValue(['removable', -1, 'content_2'], new_content)

    ### Add new rows to initially visible groups
    repeatRow(['visible'])
    repeatRow(['removable'])

    ### Add new raw to the initially hidden group
    repeatRow(['hidden'])

    ### Set text fields values of the initially hidden group row
    setValue(['hidden', -1, 'content_3'], new_content)
    
    return
